mapper.select: select ID,CUSTOMFIELD,CUSTOMFIELDCONFIG,CUSTOMVALUE from customfieldoption where CUSTOMFIELD=10907 or CUSTOMFIELD=10200
select user_name,last_name,email_address from cwd_user where active =1

SELECT va.ID, va.ISSUE, va.CUSTOMFIELD, va.STRINGVALUE, ji.pkey, ji.PROJECT, ji.issuetype, ji.SUMMARY, ji.DESCRIPTION, cus.customvalue FROM customfieldvalue va, jiraissue ji, customfieldoption cus WHERE ji.ID = va.ISSUE AND cus.ID = va.STRINGVALUE AND va.CUSTOMFIELD = 10907 and va.STRINGVALUE = #{stringValue} and cus.customvalue = #{customValue}

SELECT va.ID, va.ISSUE, va.CUSTOMFIELD, va.STRINGVALUE, ji.pkey, ji.PROJECT, ji.issuetype, ji.SUMMARY, ji.DESCRIPTION FROM dbo.customfieldvalue va, dbo.jiraissue ji WHERE ji.ID = va.ISSUE AND va.CUSTOMFIELD ='10400' and va.stringvalue like '%'+#{prefix}+'%' and va.stringvalue like '%'+#{version}+'%'
